thread.title: High school wrestler takes down alleged burglar breaking into car
thread.title_full: High school wrestler takes down alleged burglar breaking into car

author: Alyse Jones
title: High school wrestler takes down alleged burglar breaking into car
text: A high school wrestler took down an alleged burglar breaking into his car. Officers with the Harrah Police Department said this started as a call for a fight. When they got to the scene, they found three men fighting on the ground. >> Download the KOCO 5 AppThey were able to separate them, and that's when they learned that the suspect was attempting to break into a car but was caught and confronted by the victim. That victim was then punched in the face by the suspect. Another man came to help the victim, and the two were able to get the suspect to the ground. When police arrived, they took the suspect into custody, but the trouble didn't end there. "On the way to the Oklahoma County Detention Center, he attempted to break out of our officer's patrol car. Once he arrived at the detention center, while they were walking him into the jail, he managed to slip out of one of the closing doors, and they had to pursue him into the parking area, still inside the fenced area where he was apprehended," said Chief Mart Burns with the Harrah Police Department. Get the latest news stories of interest by clicking here.The suspect was booked into the Oklahoma County jail and faces charges of grand larceny, assault and battery, possession of drugs and destruction of property.
